text: Paris Hilton and Chris Zylka shared a kiss on the red carpet last night! The 36 - year - old former reality star and 31 - year - old The Leftovers actor were in attendance at the 2017 MOCA Gala on Saturday night ( April 29 ) in Los Angeles. Also in attendance at the event were Ricky Martin with his fiance Jwan Yoseph, Ryan Seacrest with his girlfriend Shayna Taylor, Sean Penn, Patricia Arquette with her boyfriend Eric White, Pierce Brosnan with wife Keely Shaye Smith, Liz Goldwyn, Jennifer Tilly, China Chow, and the Winklevoss twins – Cameron and Tyler. 25 + pictures inside from the MOCA gala ….
